name: City Trial Motorbike
description:
City Trial Motorbike is 3D motor racing game with simple control and nice graphic effect.
Very realistic 3D graphics and environment.

* Racing and Cross Motorbike
* Two simple controllers
* Smooth and realistic motor handling
* Just swap your phone to control motor direction
* Tap the screen to accelerate the motor
* Stunning 3D graphics
* Different kind of motors to choose from
* Gorgeous pro visual effects

The most vibrant, super-charged motor racing game.
